item.title: Pothole, 14th February
item.description:
Has been ‘repaired’ poorly several times, at least twice in last 12 months. Stop wasting tax payers money and fix it properly. I actually witnessed the last time it was ‘repaired’ and frankly your workers or contractors clearly are untrained, lack supervision or worse don’t care. You then hike our tax bills.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bouncers Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Garden waste left on verge, 14th February

item.title: 5 to 7 inch potholes on Mead Road Leckhampton, 14th February
item.description:
All along Mead Rd Cheltenham from the junction with Naunton Lane up to the T junction with Churchhill Rd, there are numerous potholes which as a cyclist I have to swerve to avoid daily plus it dangerous for car drivers.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mead Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
